com.bitwig.base.control_surface.iface

Interface ClipLauncherSlots

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClipLauncherScenesOrSlots

    public interface ClipLauncherSlots
extends ClipLauncherScenesOrSlots
    ClipSlots is a scrollable window of N slots onto the clip launcher of a specific track.

    • Method Detail

      • addColorObserver

        void addColorObserver(org.mozilla.javascript.Callable callback)
        Add an observer on the colors of the clips.
        Parameters:
        callback - receiving (int slot, float red, float green, float blue) with slot being the index in the window and the color values as floating point [0 .. 1]

      • addHasContentObserver

        void addHasContentObserver(org.mozilla.javascript.Callable callback)
        Add an observer notifying if which slots has a clip in them
        Parameters:
        callback - receiving (int slot, bool hasContent)

      • addIsPlayingObserver

        Add an observer if clip is playing on the slot.
        Parameters:
        callback - receiving (int slot, bool isPlaying)
